content:
I have :
- set the difficulty to "very hard"  (is this puzzle really that hard?)
- added a test / validator, where I have isolated the source of the issue mentioned by masterglob.

Thanks to @Remi_avec_un_i for his help.

There is a problem with Validator 8 and 10.
It seems that they may fail while all IDE tests are OK, when two buildings are next one to the other (x_2 of first building  equals x_1 of second building, with different heights). The case is not covered in IDE.

I had to find and use this contribution page to solve it thanks to validators access.
Maybe inverting IDE & Validation 8 (or 10) would make it possible to understand the problem in this case
